dict.acceptation: 充分地；完全地；足足；彻底地；

sent.orig: Going from one fully maximized spreadsheet to another fully maximized spreadsheet is powerful and effective.
sent.trans: 从一个最大化的电子表单到另一个最大化的电子表单，既容易操作，也很有效。

sent.orig: The company introduced a fully automated production line, fully automatic machine CD.
sent.trans: 公司引进了全自动生产流水线，全自动裁板机。

sent.orig: At present I know partially; then I shall fully, as am fully known.
sent.trans: 我现在所认识的，只是局部的，那时我就要全认清了，如同我全被认清一样。

sent.orig: Now I know in part; then I shall know fully, even as am fully known.
sent.trans: 我如今所知道的有限，到时我就全知道了，如同主知道我一样。

sent.orig: D, do not weld fully weld fully to denote weld superficially continuous or intermittent groove.
sent.trans: 未焊满未焊满是指焊缝表面上连续的或断续的沟槽。
